alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 09 at 9:49PM CDT until May 10 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Christian and Greene. * WHEN...Until 100 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 948 PM CDT, Emergency management reported a stalled vehicle at the intersection of Scenic Avenue and Sunshine Street due to flooding on the roadway. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Wilson Creek at Farm Road 156, Wilson`s Creek at Farm Road 150 and Wilson Creek at Farm Road 146. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Springfield, Nixa, Ozark, Battlefield, Strafford, Fremont Hills, Brookline and Galloway. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
